short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smooth and denoise your strava run to get the info you care about!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new button appears on any Strava activity page, which allows you to jump to the strava.reillybrothers.net smoother page for that activity!

You'll have many customizable controls from there, which make it easier to extract useful information from the paces of your activity.
